questions.question_text: A rectangular garden is 10 meters long and 5 meters wide. If you want to build a fence around the entire garden and cover the garden with grass, how much fencing material and how much grass would you need, respectively?
options: 20 meters of fencing and 25 square meters of grass
30 meters of fencing and 50 square meters of grass
15 meters of fencing and 15 square meters of grass
30 meters of fencing and 15 square meters of grass

questions.question_text: A square tile has a side length of 12 cm. What is its perimeter? What is its area? If you have 4 such tiles, what is the total area they cover?
options: Perimeter = 48 cm, Area = 144 cm², Total Area = 576 cm²
Perimeter = 144 cm, Area = 48 cm², Total Area = 192 cm²
Perimeter = 48 cm, Area = 144 cm², Total Area = 720 cm²
Perimeter = 12 cm, Area = 12 cm², Total Area = 48 cm²
